column1: #text=I was excited to go home for the holidays last December , but I was less excited about having to take an airplane !
#text=I normally would drive , but my mother persuaded me to take a plane because she was afraid I would have to drive through snow .
#text=I filled a single suitcase with as many necessities I could fit , because I did not want to have to deal with putting multiple suitcases through the luggage handler .
#text=I arrived at the airport and waited in line to check in .
#text=I let the TSA search me for any contraband that would not be allowed on the plane , and then waited to be allowed to board .
#text=Once we were let on the plane , I walked over to my seat and shoved my suitcase into the overhead compartment .
#text=Luckily it fit , so I would be able to keep it with me .
#text=I snuggled into my seat and tried to ignore the butterflies in my stomach .
#text=The person seated directly next to me was a middle aged woman flying alone .
#text=She gave me a sympathetic smile and asked me if I was as nervous as she was .
#text=I said yes , and I think we both felt better that at least we would be good seatmates .
#text=The plane ride was uneventful ; after five hours in the air , we landed at our destination in one piece .
